title: Gallery Conversation: Kanga Cloths—East African Culture, Design, and Fashion
short_description: Join Janet Purdy, associate curator of textiles, for a discussion of the history of the colorful, industrially-printed textiles known as kanga and the social and cultural symbolism expressed in their designs and proverbs. Explore eight workson display in the African galleries spanning five countries.
